data.title: Parque Eugenio Maria de Hostos, Santo Domingo
data.meta_description: Inaugurated on 26 December 1937 by the government of dictator Rafael Leonidas Trujillo, Mar√≠a de Hostos Park, then known as Ranfis Park is one of the first attempts at modernization in Santo Domino. The park, which was originally designed by the skilled architect, Rafael Leonidas Trujillo has recently undergone massive remodeling and restoration to bring it back to its former glory. The park has a swimming pool, gym, bike track and other fun activities for families for a fun day out.
